ApiName.description: The API name of an actionable event orchestration record.

ContextDefinitionId.description: The context definition related to the expression set that processes an actionable event.

ContextDefinitionName.description: The name of a context definition that's associated with the actionable event orchestration.

ContextMappingId.description: The context mapping that processes an actionable event.

ContextMappingName.description: The name of a context mapping in the context definition that's associated with the actionable event orchestration.

DefinitionId.description: The unique identifier of the actionable event orchestration's definition.

EventCategory.description: The category of an actionable event.

EventSubtypeId.description: The subtype of an actionable event.

EventTypeId.description: The type of an actionable event.

ExecutionProcedureId.description: The expression set or flow definition that executes the orchestration.

ExecutionProcedureName.description: The name of the flow definition or the expression set template that executes the orchestration.

ExecutionProcedureType.description: Specifies the type of automated procedure that executes the orchestration.

IsActive.description: Specifies if an actionable event orchestration record is active (true) or not (false).

IsInstalledTemplate.description: Indicates whether the actionable event orchestration is an installed template that can't be modified (true) or not (false).

IsTemplate.description: Indicates whether the actionable event orchestration is a template (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the associated location was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the associated location was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of an actionable event orchestration record.

OwnerId.description: The owner ID of an actionable event orchestration record.

UsageType.description: The usage type of the event orchestration.
